00110 typedef int (*vprintf_callback_t)(const char *fmt, va_list ap);
00111 
00112 void trace_set_log_level(int level);
00113 int trace_get_log_level();

00119 void trace_log_body(int level, const char *fmt, ...);
00120 
00121 /* Logger function for fatal error messages.  The macro #trace_fatal() should
00122    be used instead of this function. */
00123 void trace_fatal_body(const char *fmt, ...);
00124 
00125 /* Logger function for error messages.  The macro #trace_error() should
00126    be used instead of this function.  */
00127 void trace_error_body(const char *fmt, ...);
00128 
00129 /* Logger function for warning messages.  The macro #trace_warn() should
00130    be used instead of this function.  */
00131 void trace_warn_body(const char *fmt, ...);
00132 
00133 /* Logger function for info messages.  The macro #trace_info() should
00134    be used instead of this function.  */
00135 void trace_info_body(const char *fmt, ...);
00136 
00137 /* Logger function for debug messages.  The macro #trace_debug() should
00138    be used instead of this function.  */
00139 void trace_debug_body(const char *fmt, ...);
00140 
00141 /* Logger function for trace messages.  The macro #trace_trace() should
00142    be used instead of this function.  */
00143 void trace_trace_body(const char *fmt, ...);
